.flexible-tabs-item-{{ section.id }} { width: 100%; padding: {{ item_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ item_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px; border-radius: {{ item_radius }}px; border: {{ section.id }}:nth-child(2) { margin: 0px; } .flexible-tabs-toggle-{{ section.id }} { display: flex; align-items: center; cursor: pointer; gap: 12px; justify-content: space-between; } .flexible-tabs-arrow-{{ section.id }} { display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; flex: 0 0 {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px; height: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px; border-radius: 50%; transition: all 0.3s ease 0s; background-color: {{ icon_bg_color }}; border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ icon_border_color }}; } .flexible-tabs-arrow-{{ section.id }} svg { margin-top: .flexible-tabs-arrow-rotate-{{ section.id }} { transition: all 0.3s ease 0s; transform: rotate(var(--rotate)); transform-origin: center; transform-box: fill-box; } .flexible-tabs-question-{{ section.id }} { margin: 0px; font-size: {{ question_size_mobile }}px; color: {{ question_color }}; line-height: {{ question_height }}%; text-transform: unset; font-weight: 700; } close_other.label: Auto-close tabs
close_other.description: Automatically close other tabs when opening a new one (save editor for setting to work)

background_gradient.label: Section background gradient
background_gradient.description: Remove gradient to replace with solid colors
